en-us.welcome_message: Mixnode tool initialized please be patient checking and updating server
en-us.version_warning: Warning script and nym binaries are tested on Ubuntu 20.04
en-us.nat_ok: The server is not behind a NAT
en-us.nat_fail: The server is behind a NAT if you running on a home network please check the docs about port forwarding
en-us.root_warning: Warning you should create a sudo user for running nym
en-us.reconecting: Reconnecting as new user please re run script after connecting
